snippet: Blue Rider Press has acquired "Siri & Me," a new work of fiction by David Milgrim, about a 29-year-old writer and blogger who falls in love with the woman living inside his iPhone.
abstract: Blue Rider Press has acquired "Siri & Me," a new work of fiction by David Milgrim, about a 29-year-old writer and blogger who falls in love with the woman living inside his iPhone.
lead_paragraph: What can Siri help you with now?  The voice-activated operator built into Apple's iPhone 4S can assist you with landing a book deal and perhaps even with filling that void in your soul where a human romantic partner should go.

headline.main: Does Siri Speak the Language of Love? A New Book Investigates
